name: Athos
description:
The remnants of humanity are forced to leave a ravaged Earth behind, seeking refuge on a distant planet, Athos. However, the planets atmosphere only allows teleportation of humans to the planets surface stranding them among prehistoric dinosaurs and untamed wilderness. In this thrilling adventure, you must rely on your survival instincts to thrive amidst the rugged wilderness. Your mission is twofold: build a formidable base to protect yourself from the wild and unpredictable environment, and master the art of taming mighty dinosaurs to be your loyal companions and fierce defenders. Are you ready to embrace the challenge of a lifetime, where every decision and action will shape your fate on this planet ? Get ready to unleash your primal instincts and embark on an epic quest to conquer the untamed realm of the dinosaurs. Welcome to a world where survival is not just a choice but a way of life!

Upon starting, each player is dropped into the vast and diverse landscapes of the prehistoric world of Athos. The game world is teeming with various species of dinosaurs, from the towering Tyrannosaurus rex to the nimble Velociraptor. Armed with only primitive tools and their wits, players must quickly gather resources like wood, stone, and food to build shelters, craft weapons, and stay alive.


Surviving the game means facing the ever-present danger of dinosaurs. Some dinosaurs can be tamed and used as mounts, providing players with a distinct advantage, while others are relentless predators that require careful strategy to defeat. Players can team up to take down larger threats or go solo to hone their survival skills.


Throughout the game, players can collect blueprints and rare resources to craft more advanced weapons, armor, and tools. As players level up, they gain access to new abilities and skills that aid in combat and survival. Choose your playstyle and tailor your character to dominate the primordial landscape.


Athos immerses players in a thrilling survival adventure where they must navigate a perilous alien world, interact with majestic yet dangerous dinosaurs, and uncover the mysteries that lie beneath the surface. With its dynamic gameplay, and rich narrative elements, the game offers an unforgettable journey of exploration, adaptation, and survival in the face of daunting odds.
